StepData.description: Congratulations on your first Chimera. It’s so cute!
Chimeras generate essence which can be seen in the top right.
Essence can be used to purchase Chimeras and Facilities in the Marketplace.
You can check up on your Chimera's attributes by clicking the arrow on the left.
You can navigate the World map and visit all the available location by pressing the world icon in the top left corner.
You can adjust this game to fit your preferences and exit this application in the settings menu.
Finally, you can monitor and start expiditions for your Chimera using the Expeditions Icon in the bottom right, next to the marketplace.
Now explore and see what you can find!,
Here is where you can view your Chimera’s stats!
All Chimeras have different levels of Endurance, Strength, and Intelligence which can help them out during missions!
They also have happiness levels which are based on how much they like the area they are currently placed in and modify how much essence they create.
The happier the Chimera the more essence they generate!
Finally you can also use the 'T' button to Teleport Chimeras to different Areas.
Chimeras might prefer some areas to others so it’s a good idea to experiment with locations to see which ones your chimera’s prefer.
Here you can purchase new Chimeras.
There are three family types which can each branch off into three other chimeras depending on which facilities you choose to train them in.
Try Picking one of the Chimera types and see what you get.
Who knows it might just be your new best friend!
